body:
Filter legal targets can be confusing to some users as it prevents them from making certain legal actions such as putting -1/-1 tokens on their own creatures.

Options:
1. make "Filter legal targets" off be default
2. keep it on by default, but make the preference menu more obvious so that users cnd tweak it themselves (promote it to top level, i.e. Arena Preferences Help)
